Vigili del fuoco sul posto
06 Nov 2019, 15:00 by Redazione

text:
Panic on the Avellino-Salerno: tir loses control and invades the other lane
Fire brigade on the spot
06 Nov 2019, 15:00 by Redazione



Moments of authentic terror on the Raccordo Avellino-Salerno. According to what has been learned, a big truck lost control and ended up sideways invading both lanes of traffic.
Polstrada agents promptly arrived on the spot to coordinate the rescue operations, in addition to the fire brigade, which are working to make the vehicle safe.
